title: For The Love Of Santa | 2025 Christmas Romance Movie | Free Hallmark Christmas Movie

sources.title: For The Love Of Santa | 2025 Christmas Romance Movie | Free Hallmark Christmas Movie
sources.description:
*Santa's Second Wife* - Mrs. Claus grows tired of playing second fiddle to Christmas, so she divorces Santa. Once they sign the scroll, Santa and Mrs. Claus return to their 40-year-old selves and re-enter the dating pool. Nick (Santa) meets Neve, a divorced mom of three, and they fall in love. Unfortunately, the former Mrs. Claus doesn't think that Nick should have his happily ever after with someone new so soon, and outs his identity to Neve and her children.

2024.  Stars: Jason Frederick, Sara Pardo Fishburn, Chelsea Gilson
*Licensed from Gemelli. All rights reserved*
